DataElement.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization Apheresis Collection Total Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The total number of apheresis collection days for the hematopoietic stem cell mobilization.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization Apheresis Collection Total Day
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The recruitment of hematopoietic stem cells from the bone marrow into peripheral blood._A procedure that collects a component of the peripheral blood while returning the rest to the donor._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization Pheresis Collection
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The recruitment of hematopoietic stem cells from the bone marrow into peripheral blood.:A procedure in which blood is collected, part of the blood such as platelets or white blood cells is taken out, and the rest of the blood is returned to the donor.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: The recruitment of hematopoietic stem cells from the bone marrow into peripheral blood.
A procedure that collects a component of the peripheral blood while returning the rest to the donor.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/11/17 tt transferred context, added reg status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.
